1108.name: Ceramic backing strip round on aluminium tape
1108.Applications: This ceramic backing strip offer special economic advantages for submerged arc welding and MAG welding with solid wires or metal- cored wires in the downhand position as well for positional MAG welding using rutile cored wires with fast freezing slag.
1108.Suitable_For: one side welding with high currents in shipbuilding, pressure vessel fabrication, machine construction, crane building, tank, and general steel building.
